title: Cheers to Adams and Tisch for major NYC crime wins — but the fight isn’t over
description: As Mayor Eric Adams wraps up his last month in office, he deserves a round of applause for the biggest success of his administration: Bringing down New York City's sky-high crime rates.
content:
As Mayor Eric Adams wraps up his last month in office, he deserves a round of applause for the biggest success of his administration: Bringing down New York City’s sky-high crime rates.
